General.Name: Dom Development S.A.
General.Description: Dom Development S.A., together with its subsidiaries, develops and sells residential and commercial real estate properties, and related support activities in Poland. It provides project development, design and construction, marketing, sale, and customer services. The company was founded in 1995 and is based in Warsaw, Poland. Dom Development S.A. is a subsidiary of Groupe Belleforêt S.à r.l.
